name: BF and GF freestyle (local multiplayer)
description:
In here you can freestyle as BF, PIXEL BF, OR/AND GF!

Controls:

Player 1: WASD, Space and Z.

Player 2:Arrow Keys, enter and M.

Player 3: TFGH, Y, U and I.

Play the original game here: https://ninja-muffin24.itch.io/funkin.

(The HIDE GUI'S button it's still there when clicked, but if you leave it it'll be invisible, if you hover over it again it'll be visible again.)
